Reference

All functions

connect_inbo_dbase()

Connect to an INBO database

dbDisconnect(<OdbcConnection>)

Close database connection

dbFetch(<OdbcResult>)

Fetch query result from database

get_florabank_observations()

Get all validated observations for one or more taxa from the florabank database

get_florabank_taxon_ifbl_year()

Get unique combinations of taxon, IFBL-square and year.

get_florabank_traits()

Query the florabank to get taxon trait values for (a) taxon trait(s)

get_inboveg_classification()

Query classification information from INBOVEG

get_inboveg_header()

Query header information from INBOVEG

get_inboveg_qualifiers()

Query qualifier information of recordings (releve) from INBOVEG

get_inboveg_recordings()

Query recording (releve) information from INBOVEG

get_inboveg_relation()

Query relation (Parent - Child) information of recordings (releve) from INBOVEG

get_inboveg_survey()

Query survey information from INBOVEG
